text: aawarana yedima magin pasa soda yama adu karayi,emagin pase jalaya iwath wima adu karayi.mehidi ihalama wasiya wanuye,pase ushnakwaya adu kirimayi.emagin mulwala jalaya ura ganime karya pahasu karawayi.mehidi wiwidha athuranu drawya magin pol gase pohora kawaya pradeshaya ( adi 6k thula) athuranu yodayi.me sadaha pol leli,pol athu,wiwidha gaswala athu,pidura,wal palati kotas yoda gatha hakiya.pol athu saha pol leli yedima wadath sudusuya.

awidyawatada hethuwak thibiya yuthu athara eya palayak washayen da athitha yam hethuwak nisa athi wu manasikathwayak bawin mulahethun soya wehesimata wada pawathna hethupalayan nathikirima pragnyagochara we.saththwayage pawathma wiwidhakarayen wedanakari bawin eya aaryanyanayen awabodha karagena eyata hethuwath, nathikirime margayath prathamayen danagena buduradun lokayata deshana kala seka.pawathna panchaskhandhaya menma samastha lokayama mohothak pasa dukwedana sanyukthawaga widyathmaka lokayata itha hondin pahadili wuwada eyata hethuwa nathikirima wenuwata palaya samaga therapimata ekineka paraya piyawara thabannata yamen wisheshayen samastha manawa parapura menma saththwa santhathiyama bhayanaka durwipakayakata muna pamin sitina mohothaka apa budurajanan wahansege prathama udanayen prakatawana gahakaraka, gahakuta, wisankhara yana dharmayan kerehi sihibuddhiya yoma wimukthi margayata langawimata piyawara gatha yuthu wanne ya.oba samata theruwan saranayi!
